name: twineedle
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Jabs the foe twice
using stingers.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Jabs the foe twice
using stingers.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:

jab the foe twice.

jab the foe twice.
